origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BankAPI.get_historical_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves historical data for a specified bank, including operational costs, asset turnover rate, and inventory turnover rate over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bankName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank, e.g., 民生银行.'}, {'name': 'dataType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to retrieve, e.g., 运营成本, 资产周转率, 存货周转率.'}, {'name': 'timePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which data is requested, e.g., 过去五年.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The historical data retrieved based on the specified parameters.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BankAPI.get_historical_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'bankName'是'民生银行', 'dataType'是'运营成本', 'timePeriod'是'过去五年'.
